ComicInfo.Summary:
Magicman!: Magicman is the immortal son of the wizard Cagliostro. In the present day he joins the Army to fight in Viet Nam as PFC Tom Cargill and decides to use his magical abilities secretly as Magicman.
Missing: Frederick Forbes!: Banker Frederick Forbes vanished in 1867 with a great amount of the townspeoples' money. Nearly a hundred years later, his great-grandson agrees to undergo hypnosis to solve the mystery, and learns that it was accidental death, not villainy, that caused Forbes to disappear, and the money is finally recovered.
No Good to the World!: Willie Stover and his pet frog Oswald accidentally foil an invasion from a microscopic world while being held after school for detention.
ComicInfo.Title: Magicman!; Missing: Frederick Forbes!; No Good to the World!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
